# MIDI

**Instance Property**

Use this field for MIDI events.

## Declaration

```swift
var MIDI: AUMIDIEvent { get set }
```

## Instance Properties

- **head**: Use this field to determine the event type.
- **parameter**: Use this field for parameter events.
- **MIDIEventsList**

items.description: Use this field to determine the event type.
items.name: head

items.description: Use this field for parameter events.
items.name: parameter
